name: fell
content:
fell verb
(FALL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple of
fall
fell verb
(CUT DOWN)
[ T ] to cut down a tree: A great number of trees were felled to provide space for grazing.
[ T ] to knock someone down, especially in sports: He eventually felled his opponent with a punch to the head.
